titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the prevention of mental disorders and substance abuse among children, youth, and young adults, and the promotion of mental health and wellness among these populations, should be a public health priority.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
5/21/2008--Introduced.
Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the prevention of mental disorders and substance abuse among children, youth, and young adults and the promotion of their mental health and wellness should be a public health priority.
